en: Hear my cry, O God; Attend unto my prayer.
hmr: Aw Pathien, ka khêk ri hi lo hre la, Ka ṭawngṭâina hi lo ngai rawh.

en: From the end of the earth will I call unto thee, when my heart is overwhelmed: Lead me to the rock that is higher than I.
hmr: Ka lungril a chau lai hin kâwlkila inthawk hin ko ka ti che; Lungpui keia nêka insânga chun mi ṭhuoi la.

en: For thou hast been a refuge for me, A strong tower from the enemy.
hmr: Nang chu keia ta dinga humhimna, A mi dotuhaia inthawka râlvêngbûk insâng dettak i ni sih a.

en: I will dwell in thy tabernacle for ever: I will take refuge in the covert of thy wings. [Selah
hmr: I puon ina chun kumkhuoin um ka ta, I thla hnuoi inbîkna hmuna chun tlulût ka tih.

en: For thou, O God, hast heard my vows: Thou hast given me the heritage of those that fear thy name.
hmr: Aw Pathien, nang chun ka thutiemhai i ngai sih a, I hming ṭituhai ram hluo chu i mi pêk a.

en: Thou wilt prolong the king’s life; His years shall be as many generations.
hmr: Lal dam sûng hi suksei i ta, A kumhai chu suon tamtak tluk nîng a tih.

en: He shall abide before God for ever: Oh prepare lovingkindness and truth, that they may preserve him.
hmr: Pathien hmaah kumkhuoin um zing a tih, Aw, ama humhim theina dingin ngilneina le thutak buotsai rawh.

en: So will I sing praise unto thy name for ever, That I may daily perform my vows.
hmr: Chuongchun, ka thutiemhai ni tina ka thaw sawng theina dingin, Kumkhuoin i hming inpâkin hla sak ka tih.
